definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ex 13:3 that which is leavened—´[[ח]] Ex 12:15 + 10 t.—forbidden at Passover Ex 12:15 (P), Ex 13:3, Ex 13:7 (JE), De 16:3, in all sacrifices Ex 23:18, Ex 34:25 (both JE); cf. Am 4:5; Le 2:11, Le 6:10 (P; appos.); exceptions are ´[[לֶחֶם ח]] of peace-offering Le 7:13 (P), and the wave-loaves (´[[ח]] appos.) Le 23:17 (H).—v. RS:Sem 208 OTJC 2, 345.
